author.name: Licensed by Woolworths  ©️ Dorling Kindersley Ltd

description: Try our easy to follow Pineapple Fritters recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Pineapple Fritters Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 pineapple, peeled, cored, and sliced into 1/2 in rings, then cut in half crosswise

recipeInstructions.text: To make the batter combine the flour, sugar, and salt in a large bowl. Add the milk, 1 egg, and 1 egg yolk. Whisk quickly until smooth and lumpfree.
Beat the egg white until stiff peaks form, and fold gently into the batter.

Add enough oil to come halfway up the sides of a large frying pan, and heat to 180°C over high heat. Dip the pineapple into the batter, then carefully add to the oil. Deepfry for about 3 minutes, or until golden brown on both sides.
Using a slotted spoon, transfer to paper towels to drain. Sift confectioner's sugar on top and serve hot.
